name: vestige_016: corpse heart
description: [automatically generated transcript follows] --- that is why the vivisection process is so misnamed here... in this case the heart, while beating, is in fact already dead. Lately, the highest utility we have found has been the identification of unjust murder victims. With the return of the Dead God, anyone killed by murder whose killer has not been brought to justice will have their heart turned into a corpse heart, beating out a cry for retribution. Of course, many use the excuse of fear, disease, or even 'evil' as an excuse to order cremations. Rest assured, we now have a standard procedure in place to acquire the heart of all unexplained deaths prior to their cremation. I personally promise that --- [transcript end]
